Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1

Class Poker

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.Game
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.Poker
public class Poker extends Game
Represents the Poker game implementation, extending the base Game class. Manages game phases, players, betting, card dealing, and winner determination.

    • startGame

      public void startGame() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Starts the game by dealing cards and notifying players about the start of betting.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during card dealing.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during the game setup.

    • dealCards

      public void dealCards()
      Deals 5 cards to each player from the deck.

    • notifyPlayersAboutTheirCards

      public void notifyPlayersAboutTheirCards() throws IOException
      Notifies players about their dealt cards.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending the message to the player.

    • performBetting

      public void performBetting() throws IOException
      Manages the betting process for each player.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending responses to players.

    • managePlayerBettingTurn

      public int managePlayerBettingTurn(SocketChannel clientChannel, String[] splitted, int currentPlayerIndex) throws IOException
      Manages a player's betting action (check, bet, fold, raise, or call).
      Parameters:
      clientChannel - The client's channel.
      splitted - The split user input containing the action and amount (if applicable).
      currentPlayerIndex - The index of the current player.
      Returns:
      -1 if the action is valid, -2 if invalid, or the winner's index if all players folded.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process.

    • exchangeCards

      public void exchangeCards(List<Integer> cardNumbers, int currentPlayerIndex) throws CardsParsingException
      Allows a player to exchange cards.
      Parameters:
      cardNumbers - The indices of the cards to be exchanged.
      currentPlayerIndex - The index of the current player.
      Throws:
      CardsParsingException - if an error occurs while parsing the card exchange request.

    • decideWinner

      public String decideWinner()
      Determines the winner based on the best hand among remaining players.
      Returns:
      A string describing the winner(s) and the amount won.

    • getBestHandIndexAndBestHand

      public IntAndString getBestHandIndexAndBestHand()
      Determines the best hand among all players who have not folded.
      Returns:
      an IntAndString object containing the index of the player with the best hand and the description of that hand.

    • manageCheck

      protected int manageCheck(SocketChannel clientChannel, int currentPlayerIndex) throws IOException
      Handles the "check" action for a player.
      Parameters:
      clientChannel - The channel of the client performing the check.
      currentPlayerIndex - The index of the current player checking.
      Returns:
      -2 if checking is invalid, -1 otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • manageCardExchange

      public int manageCardExchange(SocketChannel clientChannel, String request, int currentPlayerIndex) throws IOException
      Handles the card exchange phase for a player.
      Parameters:
      clientChannel - The channel of the client requesting the card exchange.
      request - The client's input specifying which cards to exchange.
      currentPlayerIndex - The index of the current player exchanging cards.
      Returns:
      -2 if the request is invalid, -1 otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • disconnectAllPlayersAndResetGame

      public void disconnectAllPlayersAndResetGame() throws PlayerDisconnectedException
      Disconnects all players and resets the game state.
      Throws:
      PlayerDisconnectedException - if an error occurs during player disconnection.

    • handleBetting

      public int handleBetting(String request, SocketChannel clientChannel, int currentPlayerIndex) throws IOException, PlayerDisconnectedException
      Handles a betting request from a client.
      Parameters:
      request - The betting request received from the client.
      clientChannel - The client's channel.
      currentPlayerIndex - The index of the current player.
      Returns:
      The index of the winner if all other players folded, or -1 otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      PlayerDisconnectedException - if a player is disconnected during betting.

    • remove

      public void remove(SelectionKey key)
      Removes a player from the game based on their selection key.
      Parameters:
      key - The selection key of the player to be removed.

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Resets the game state, clearing players, bets, and other game variables.
      Overrides:
      resetGame in class Game

    • performCardExchange

      public void performCardExchange() throws IOException
      Handles the card exchange phase for all players.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • performShowDown

      public void performShowDown() throws IOException, PlayerDisconnectedException
      Executes the showdown phase, revealing all player hands and determining the winner.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      PlayerDisconnectedException - if a player is disconnected during the showdown.

    • handleClientTurn

      public void handleClientTurn(SelectionKey key, String request, SocketChannel clientChannel) throws IOException, InterruptedException, PlayerDisconnectedException
      Processes a client's turn based on the current phase of the game.
      Parameters:
      key - The selection key of the current client.
      request - The request received from the client.
      clientChannel - The channel of the current client.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during processing.
      PlayerDisconnectedException - if a player is disconnected during their turn.

    • performValidAction

      public void performValidAction() throws IOException, PlayerDisconnectedException
      Moves to the next valid player who has not folded and continues the game flow.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      PlayerDisconnectedException - if a player is disconnected during action execution.

    • endBetting

      protected boolean endBetting() throws IOException, PlayerDisconnectedException
      Ends the current betting phase and progresses to the next game phase.
      Returns:
      true if everyone betted the same, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      PlayerDisconnectedException

    • forceBetting

      protected void forceBetting() throws IOException
      Forces players who have not met the current bet to make a decision.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • handleClientConnection

      public void handleClientConnection(SocketChannel sc, Selector selector) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Handles a new client connection, adding them to the game if possible.
      Overrides:
      handleClientConnection in class Game
      Parameters:
      sc - The socket channel of the connecting client.
      selector - The selector managing the client's channel.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during connection handling.

    • handleClientRequest

      public void handleClientRequest(SocketChannel clientChannel, ByteBuffer buffer, SelectionKey key) throws PlayerDisconnectedException
      Processes a request from a connected client.
      Overrides:
      handleClientRequest in class Game
      Parameters:
      clientChannel - The client's channel.
      buffer - The buffer containing the client's request.
      key - The selection key of the client.
      Throws:
      PlayerDisconnectedException - if a player disconnects during request handling.
